Title: Warmly congratulate the 20th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China - Exhibition of art works of workers-peasants-soldiers of Shaanxi Province
Notes: Exhibition organized by the 'Work Propaganda Team of the Workers, Peasants and Soldiers Art School in Shaanxi Province' (驻陕西省工农兵艺术馆工宣队) and the 'Revolutionary Committee of Shaanxi Workers, Peasants and Soldiers Art School' (陕西省工农兵艺术馆革委会), held at the Shaanxi Provincial Museum (陕西省博物馆).
Tags: Talks at the Yan'an Forum on Literature and Art
在延安文艺座谈会上的讲话
